title: Senior Smart Contract Engineer
description: Design and deploy next-gen smart contracts for Base-native DeFi applications, integrating AI-powered trading, governance automation, and RWA tokenization.
fullDescription:
BaseBuzz is leading the charge in AI-driven DeFi, bringing advanced trading mechanisms, governance models, and real-world asset tokenization to Base. We are seeking an experienced Smart Contract Engineer to build and optimize our protocol’s smart contract infrastructure.

As a key contributor, you will be responsible for designing and deploying gas-optimized, upgradeable smart contracts, ensuring security, efficiency, and seamless interoperability across Base-native applications.
responsibilities: Architect and develop smart contracts for high-efficiency DeFi protocols on Base.
Design and implement core BaseBuzz protocol mechanics, including governance, staking, and liquidity incentives.
Optimize smart contracts for gas efficiency while maintaining high security standards.
Conduct research on emerging Solidity paradigms and implement innovative contract architectures.
Collaborate with backend and frontend teams to integrate smart contract functionality into BaseBuzz apps.
Participate in security reviews, audits, and on-chain monitoring to safeguard protocol integrity.

mustHave: 4+ years of experience building and deploying production-grade Solidity contracts.
Deep expertise in the Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) and Base chain mechanics.
Prior experience deploying and maintaining smart contracts on Ethereum L2s (Base, Optimism, Arbitrum).
Strong understanding of DeFi primitives: AMMs, lending protocols, staking mechanisms.
Proven ability to optimize smart contracts for gas efficiency and security.
niceToHave: Degree in Computer Science, Mathematics, or related field.
Experience implementing complex financial models and algorithms in Solidity.
Familiarity with zkSync, Optimistic Rollups, and cross-chain messaging protocols.
Prior contributions to open-source DeFi projects.
Experience with frontend (React, TypeScript) and Web3 integrations.

compensation.tokenRewards: Earn $BASEBUZZ via on-chain staking & governance participation.
benefits: Access to exclusive DeFi tools and trading incentives.
On-chain reputation tracking—build your Web3 work history.
Staked governance power in BaseBuzz ecosystem apps.
